item.title: Avsnitt 113. Podden på tiden – VALBORGSPODDEN
item.description: Så blev det ännu en podd från strävsamma paret Christer Sturmark och Staffan Dopping. Inspelad på Lidingö Valborgsmässoafton 2023. Feed: https://poddenpatiden.se/?feed=itunes-podcast-feed&post_type=podcast

item.title: A Leadership Guide to More Cultural Agility with Prof. Paula Caligiuri
item.description:
Cultural agility is a leadership skill many executives, managers and entrepreneurs don’t typically think about.

But the ability to work effectively with people from different cultures is increasingly important as domestic workplaces become more diversified and as more businesses expand their markets overseas.

It can be challenging, but Prof. Paula Caligiuri, a Distinguished Professor of International Business at Northeastern University offers guidance for more success... Feed: https://feeds.captivate.fm/business-confidential-n/
